name: scraperai
description: ScraperAI is an open-source, AI-powered tool designed to simplify web scraping for users of all skill levels.
readme_summary: ScraperAI is an open-source, AI-powered tool that simplifies web scraping by automatically detecting page types, extracting data, and generating reusable scraping configurations. It leverages LLMs like ChatGPT and supports custom crawlers and Selenium for robust web data extraction.
primary_use_case: Simplifying web scraping for users of all skill levels through AI-powered automation and data extraction.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, anthropomorphic robot with a magnifying glass and a data-gathering net, standing on a stylized, simplified webpage. The robot is actively 'catching' distinct data elements (like product names, prices, and images) from the page, which are then neatly organized into a structured digital blueprint or recipe card. Subtle glowing lines connect the caught data to the robot's internal processing unit, represented by a small, glowing orb. The background is a clean, abstract digital space with faint code snippets and UI elements. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with bright, friendly colors and clear, bold outlines, emphasizing ease of use and intelligent automation.

name: LocalLens
description: Local Lens is a privacy-first, AI-powered photo organizer for your PC. Sort and group photos by faces, dates, and locationsâ€”all locally, with no cloud upload. Enjoy a modern, intuitive UI and keep your memories organized and secure on your own device.
readme_summary: Local Lens is a privacy-focused desktop application that uses AI to organize and categorize personal photos locally on your computer. It offers features like face recognition, date grouping, and location sorting without uploading any data to the cloud, ensuring user privacy and data security.
key_features: Cross-platform support (Windows, macOS, Linux coming soon)
primary_use_case: Organizing and managing personal photo libraries securely and privately on a local machine using AI.
cover_image_prompt: A digital librarian, depicted as a wise owl wearing spectacles, meticulously sorting and filing a cascade of glowing, ethereal photographs into distinct, labeled drawers within a cozy, book-lined study. Each drawer is subtly marked with icons representing faces, calendars, and maps. The owl uses a magnifying glass that projects holographic data points, highlighting the AI's ability to recognize patterns. Small, unobtrusive UI elements showing photo thumbnails and sorting categories are integrated into the scene. The overall mood is secure, organized, and private, with soft, warm lighting. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic.

name: macOS-use
description: Make Mac apps accessible for AI agents
readme_summary: macOS-use is a Python library that enables AI agents to interact with and control any application on macOS. It allows users to instruct their MacBook through natural language commands, which the AI then translates into actions within various apps.
key_features: AI agent interaction with macOS applications
Control any app on macOS via natural language commands
Support for multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini)
Local private inference with MLX framework (future goal)
Examples demonstrating various use cases like calculations and web logins
primary_use_case: To empower AI agents to automate tasks and control applications on macOS through natural language instructions.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, friendly robot assistant with a glowing interface is sitting at a desk, holding a magic wand that points towards a MacBook screen. On the screen, various application icons (like Calculator, Browser, Text Editor) are transforming into animated actions, with data streams flowing from the wand to the icons. The robot is looking at the user with a helpful expression. Subtle lines of code and digital particles emanate from the wand, connecting the AI's intent to the on-screen actions. The overall scene is clean, modern, and slightly whimsical, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a bright, optimistic color palette.

name: meilisearch
description: A lightning-fast search engine API bringing AI-powered hybrid search to your sites and applications.
readme_summary: Meilisearch is a high-performance, open-source search engine written in Rust. It offers a fast and relevant search experience with features like typo tolerance, faceting, and hybrid search, making it easy to integrate into applications and websites.
primary_use_case: To provide a fast, relevant, and easily integrated search experience for websites and applications.
cover_image_prompt: A wise old librarian meticulously organizing a vast, chaotic library of glowing books. With a gentle wave of their hand, they instantly sort and categorize the books, making any specific title appear instantly on a nearby illuminated pedestal. Small, subtle digital particles representing search queries float around the librarian, and the library shelves have faint, glowing lines of code. The scene is bathed in warm, inviting light, emphasizing clarity and order. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic, focusing on the metaphor of effortless information retrieval. The repository name 'Meilisearch' is subtly etched on the librarian's desk.

name: tauri
description: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop and mobile applications with a web frontend.
readme_summary: Tauri is a framework for building small, fast, and secure desktop and mobile applications using a web frontend. It leverages Rust for the backend and system webviews for rendering the user interface, offering a native-like experience with web technologies.
key_features: Builds tiny, fast, and secure desktop and mobile applications
Integrates any web frontend framework (HTML, JS, CSS)
Uses Rust for the backend binary
Leverages system webviews (WKWebView, WebView2, WebKitGTK, Android System WebView)
Built-in app bundler for various formats (.app, .dmg, .deb, .rpm, .AppImage, .exe, .msi)
primary_use_case: Developing cross-platform desktop and mobile applications with a web frontend and a Rust backend.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan, representing the Tauri framework, is meticulously crafting a miniature, highly detailed model of a futuristic city. The city is built from glowing web code elements (HTML, CSS, JS) and solid, robust Rust blocks. The artisan uses a magical blueprint that shows both web design interfaces and Rust code snippets. Small, stylized icons representing different platforms (Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, Android) are neatly arranged around the workspace, indicating the broad compatibility. The overall mood is one of precision, speed, and security, with a clean, bright lighting. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a focus on clear, understandable visual metaphors and subtle technological details.

name: surf
description: Personal AI Notebooks. Organize files & webpages and generate notes from them. Open source, local & open data, open model choice (incl. local).
readme_summary: Deta Surf is a personal AI notebook designed to streamline research and thinking by integrating files, webpages, and other digital content. It allows users to organize information into notebooks, generate notes, perform web searches, and even create interactive applications (Surflets) powered by user-selected AI models, all while prioritizing local data storage and open formats.
key_features: Multi-Media Library & Notebooks (local files, web content, links)
Smart Notes (auto-generation, web search integration, citations)
Tabs, Split View & Sidebar for navigation
Local First Data Storage (SFFS - Surf Flat File System)
primary_use_case: To act as a personal AI-powered research and note-taking assistant that integrates diverse digital content, minimizes manual data handling, and facilitates knowledge synthesis.
cover_image_prompt: A wise old librarian standing in a vast, futuristic library where shelves are made of glowing data streams and books are replaced by interactive holographic projections of webpages, PDFs, and videos. The librarian is using a magical quill that pulls information directly from these projections, instantly transcribing and synthesizing it into a beautiful, illuminated manuscript on a nearby desk. Subtle UI elements resembling Surf's interface are visible on the desk, and small digital particles representing AI are swirling around the quill. The scene is bathed in warm, inviting light, rendered in a detailed digital painting style with a focus on clarity and wonder.
